artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Hiranoya Shinzō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: left sheet of a diptych; standing man, holding a long-handled sword under his PR arm; blue and yellow garment; solid blue ground; L2001.372.194-249 received bound into a book
markings: combined date and censor seal: 酉十改 {tori jū aratame} (Cock 10 inspected); publisher\'s seal: 萬町、平のや {Yorozuchō, Hiranoya}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: in toshidama cartouche: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
text: Related to the play Kiichi Hōgen sanryaku no maki 鬼一法眼三略巻, performed at the Ichimura Theater, 1861, 9th lunar month.
title: Actor Kawarazaki Gonjūrō I as Kagekiyo
